t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    if n == 1:
        m = int(input())
        print(1)
    else:
        m = []
        s = []
        for j in range(n):
            l = input()
            x = l.index('1')
            s.append(x)
            m.append(l)
        c = 0
        for k in range(n):
            l1 = s[k]
            l2 = s[k]
            for z in range(k, n):
                l1 = min(s[z], l1)
                l2 = max(s[z], l2)
                if l2 - l1 == z - k:
                    c += 1
        print(c)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    if n == 1:
        m = int(input())
        print(1)
    else:
        m = []
        indexes = []
        for i in range(n):
            l = input()
            temp = l.index('1')
            indexes.append(temp)
            m.append(l)
        counter = 0
        for i in range(n):
            left = indexes[i]
            right = indexes[i]
            for j in range(i, n):
                left = min(indexes[j], left)
                right = max(indexes[j], right)
                if right - left == j - i:
                    counter += 1
        print(counter)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = []
    for i in range(n):
        s = input()
        ind = s.index('1') + 1
        a.append(ind)
    ans = n
    for i in range(n):
        mini = a[i]
        maxi = a[i]
        arr = []
        for x in range(i + 1, n):
            mini = min(mini, a[x])
            maxi = max(maxi, a[x])
            if maxi - mini == x - i:
                ans += 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    arr = []
    for i in range(n):
        s = input()
        arr.append(s.find('1'))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        l = r = arr[i]
        for j in range(i, len(arr)):
            l = min(arr[j], l)
            r = max(arr[j], r)
            if r - l == j - i:
                ans += 1
    print(ans)
    t -= 1

from math import factorial
for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = []
    for i in range(n):
        temp = input()
        l.append(temp.index('1'))
    res = 0
    for i in range(n):
        mmin = l[i]
        mmax = l[i]
        for j in range(i, n):
            mmin = min(mmin, l[j])
            mmax = max(mmax, l[j])
            if mmax - mmin == j - i:
                res += 1
    print(res)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    array = []
    ans = 0
    for i in range(N):
        a = input()
        array.append(a.index('1'))
    for i in range(N):
        array_subset = [array[i]]
        mx = array_subset[0]
        mn = array_subset[0]
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i + 1, N):
            k = array[j]
            array_subset.append(k)
            mn = min(mn, k)
            mx = max(mx, k)
            if mx - mn == j - i:
                ans += 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    b = [0 for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        a = input()
        b[i] = a.index('1')
    s = 0
    for i in range(n):
        s += 1
        mi = b[i]
        ma = b[i]
        for j in range(i - 1, -1, -1):
            ma = max(ma, b[j])
            mi = min(mi, b[j])
            if ma - mi == i - j:
                s += 1
    print(s)
